author: MSNBC
title: Long Covid patients, in search of relief, turn to private company
description: Long Covid symptoms can last months, even years, leaving patients losing their sense of normalcy. Private companies are stepping in to provide solutions.
content: A full two years into the coronavirus pandemic, long-haul Covid patients remain sick and in desperate search of answers. They've lost jobs. They've lost their sense of self. Many say they have lost fâ€¦ [+13400 chars]
